custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBMessage INNER JOIN MBTopic ON ([$CATEGORY_ID$]) AND (MBTopic.topicId = MBMessage.topicId)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBMessage INNER JOIN MBTopic ON (MBTopic.topicId = MBMessage.topicId) INNER JOIN MBCategory ON (MBCategory.categoryId = MBTopic.categoryId) AND (MBCategory.groupId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBMessageFlag INNER JOIN MBMessage ON (MBMessage.topicId = MBMessageFlag.topicId) AND (MBMessage.messageId = MBMessageFlag.messageId) AND (MBMessage.threadId = ?) AND (MBMessageFlag.userId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MBThread.threadId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBThread INNER JOIN MBMessage ON (MBMessage.threadId = MBThread.threadId) INNER JOIN MBTopic ON (MBTopic.topicId = MBMessage.topicId) INNER JOIN MBCategory ON (MBCategory.categoryId = MBTopic.categoryId) AND (MBCategory.groupId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {MBThread.*} FROM MBThread INNER JOIN MBMessage ON (MBMessage.threadId = MBThread.threadId) INNER JOIN MBTopic ON (MBTopic.topicId = MBMessage.topicId) INNER JOIN MBCategory ON (MBCategory.categoryId = MBTopic.categoryId) AND (MBCategory.groupId = ?) ORDER BY MBThread.lastPostDate DESC
